definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: The catalytic system has excellent functional group tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 該體系具有較好的官能團容忍性。

sentences.english: The deficient stoichiometric ratio of the resin functional group to carboxylic acid was favorable for separation.
sentences.chinese: 樹脂官能團化學計量不足可以有效地提高分離效率。

sentences.english: The result shows that the oxygenic groups decrease with the increase of coal ranks.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，隨着煤的變質程度增高，含氧官能團減少。
